enhanced-region-behavior.TrapDamageMessage: {name} triggered a trap and took {damage} {type} damage!
enhanced-region-behavior.TrapAvoidedMessage: {name} dodged a trap and took a reduced {damage} {type} damage!

saveDC.label: Save DC
saveDC.hint: The DC for the saving throw against the trap's damage.

saveAbility.label: Save Ability
saveAbility.hint: The ability used for the saving throw against the trap's damage.

damage.label: Damage
damage.hint: The amount of damage the trap deals when triggered.

savedDamage.label: Damage if Saved
savedDamage.hint: The amount of damage the trap deals if the saving throw is successful.

damageType.label: Damage Type
damageType.hint: The type of damage dealt by the trap (e.g., fire, cold, acid).

saveFailedMessage.label: Save Failed Message
saveFailedMessage.hint: Message displayed when the saving throw fails.

saveSucceededMessage.label: Save Success Message
saveSucceededMessage.hint: Message displayed when the saving throw succeeds.

disableAfterTrigger.label: Disable After Trigger
disableAfterTrigger.hint: If enabled, the trap will be disabled after it is triggered once.

automateDamage.label: Automate Damage
automateDamage.hint: If enabled, the trap will automatically apply damage when triggered.

playlistName.label: Playlist Name
playlistName.hint: The name of the music playlist find songs in.

songNames.label: Song Names
songNames.hint: Comma-separated list of song names to play.

playAll.label: Play All Songs
playAll.hint: If enabled, all songs will be played simultaneously.

stop.label: Stop Current Music
stop.hint: If enabled, all currently playing music will be stopped before starting new music.

playPlaylist.label: Play Full Playlist
playPlaylist.hint: If enabled, the full playlist will be played instead of songs.

volume.label: Volume
volume.hint: The volume level for the sound effect (0-1).

soundPath.label: Path to Sound File
soundPath.hint: The path to the sound file or sequencer effect to play.
